name: Ascendis Pharma A/S
description: Ascendis Pharma is a leading biopharma company focused on endocrinology rare diseases using their TransCon technology platform. The company has three approved medicines for hypoparathyroidism and growth disorders, with aspirations to drive >€5B annual revenue by 2030.
cash_runway: Expected operating cash flow of ~€500 million in 2026

partnerships.asset: TransCon semaglutide and other obesity/metabolic products
TransCon hGH, TransCon PTH, TransCon CNP in Japan
TransCon hGH, TransCon PTH, TransCon CNP in Greater China

investment_thesis: Becoming a leading biopharma company with three approved endocrinology rare disease medicines showing strong revenue growth
Vision 2030 to achieve >€5B annual revenue with multiple blockbuster products
Q4 2025 product revenue of ~€240 million and FY 2025 product revenue of ~€683 million demonstrating commercial execution
TransCon platform enables continuous flow of highly differentiated products with new composition of matter patents
TransCon CNP is the only achondroplasia treatment to show benefits beyond height compared to placebo in pivotal trial
Strong cash position with €616 million and expected operating cash flow of ~€500 million in 2026
key_risks: Forward-looking statements subject to significant uncertainties and risks that could cause actual results to differ materially
Investigational products limited by law to investigational use with no representations made as to safety or effectiveness
Regulatory approval timing and success not guaranteed for pipeline assets
